markdownRemark.html:
I’ll keep this post short,
Time to time, I’ve been asked about monster’s data. Well, I -do- have one, but never really share it except you ask for it. I got a spare time this weekend, so I think it’s a good idea to share it on my blog.

Image in this picture is property of もいこ taken without permission o3o


 Note that I get this data directly extracting from Eco Id’s database (10 may 2012) and I am to lazy to do some cleaning on it (except renaming the row so there might be some monster you never seen/heard. If you don’t know it, just ignore it. It might be some unreleased monster in ECOid or some debug monster or whatever. If you don’t know what row mean what, feel free to ask me here. usually you just need to know 3-5 first row though.

*EDIT: someone reported to me all exp is double than it should be. I forgot that i take the data at the DE week or something. I have replaced the file with the current normal exp, you can redownload it. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Enough chitchat, you can get the file here –> Monster list
